content: Property Asked by AnonymousAsked on 11 Sep 2018What do you think about the new Tengah Town? Is it worth it?1 answerAnswerBump0

Gabriel Tham, Tag Team Member at Kenichi Tag TeamLevel 8. WizardAnswered on 13 Sep 2018Looks very good, so far the units going to be BTO-ed are planned out to have an MRT station beside it. And because its in the west, the pricing is also lower. IF the HSR does go through and completes, I think Tengah will be hot due to its proximity to Jurong east where the HSR will be.0 comments1
